snippet.title: Reef Light Conundrum Trailer
snippet.description:
Available for purchase here: https://azagamestudio.itch.io/reef-light-conundrum
Reef Light Conundrum is a standalone realistic urban exploration simulation with themes of the paranormal & lovecraftian horror.

A VHS Found Footage Urbex Sim horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design, focusing on the feeling of exploring a old haunted fisherman's trawler ship.

Key Features: Explore the ship as events unfold unlock multiple endings and utilize your camera mechanics including sepia cam mode, limited blitz mechanic and B/W cam mode to unveil the paranormal world speak to the ghosts of the sailors, unveil the past and its secrets, utilize melee weapons to protect yourself against any dangers during your exploration.

Story: Explore a abandoned rusty fishing trawler ship rumored to be haunted after all the people onboard died due to mysterious circumstances. The ship has been decaying for 50 years and you must now proceed with your urban exploration to uncover it's past.

Currently in development by Aza Game Studio.
Coming soon.

Official site: https://www.azagamestudio.com
More of my games on Itch: https://azagamestudio.itch.io/

Thanks for watching!
